Package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.validators.plaintext

Provides an sample password validator implementation for validating plaintext password credentials in JAAS modules.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlainTextPasswordValidator
    This implementation of a password validator can validate a password against a plain-text password string.

Package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.validators.plaintext Description

Provides an sample password validator implementation for validating plaintext password credentials in JAAS modules. Plaintext passwords are not secure, and should not be used in production environments!
